overview:
Nick is a Creative Director and Visual/Interaction Designer based in Los Angeles, CA.

Nick Toga is a Co-Founder/Principal Designer at Bold Collective and the VP of User Experience & Design for Loyaldash.

At Loyaldash, he is responsible for defining and executing the user experience and visual aesthetic of the Loyaldash brand, from its Mobile and web interface, as well as any branded representation of the Loyaldash product.

Nick brings 7 years of design experience, specializing in branding, mobile and web applications. Nick was a lead designer for mobile at Myspace for a year, where he was able to design and execute a suite of MySpace branded mobile applications.

Prior to joining the mobile team, Nick was commissioned to help redesign the Myspace website. Prior to Myspace, in 2009, Nick co-founded his own design studio Bold Collective, which has since done design work for NBC Universal, Beats By Dre, Myspace, FOX Interactive, UCLA, GOOD Magazine, Art Center College of Design, and a variety of Los Angeles based startup companies.

Nick received a B.F.A with emphasis on graphic design from Art Center College of Design in Pasadena, California.
